statements: SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_id, temperature FROM patient_health_metrics ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM patient_health_metrics;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_history FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_history FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, temperature FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE treatment_history IS NOT NULL ORDER BY heart_rate DESC, temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 100;
SELECT treatment_text, treatment_date FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM patient_health_metrics GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(treatment_id) AS num_treatments FROM treatment_history GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(treatment_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE patient_id = 100 AND heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM patient_health_metrics GROUP BY patient_id HAVING AVG(heart_rate) > 70;
SELECT patient_id, timestamp, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patient_health_metrics WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '120/%';
SELECT p.patient_id, p.timestamp, p.heart_rate, t.treatment_text FROM patient_health_metrics p INNER JOIN treatment_history t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM PatientHealthMetrics WHERE heart_rate > 70;
SELECT * FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_description FROM TreatmentHistory ORDER BY treatment_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate FROM PatientHealthMetrics GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM PatientHealthMetrics WHERE blood_pressure > 120 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT treatment_id, patient_id, treatment_description FROM TreatmentHistory WHERE treatment_date = '2023-01-15' ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT block_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash FROM BlockchainHealthData WHERE timestamp > '2022-12-01' ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatientHealthMetrics WHERE heart_rate < 60 AND temperature > 98.6 ORDER BY patient_id ASC;
SELECT patient_id, MAX(heart_rate), MIN(temperature) FROM PatientHealthMetrics GROUP BY patient_id HAVING MAX(heart_rate) > 100;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patient_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT address, admission_date FROM patient_records WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM health_metrics WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT name, age, gender, address FROM patient_records WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, name, admission_date FROM patient_records ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM health_metrics WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND blood_pressure = 'Normal';
SELECT record_id, patient_id, hash_value FROM blockchain_records WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT metric_type, metric_value FROM HealthMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, doctor_email FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, visit_date, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN HealthcareHistory ON Patients.patient_id = HealthcareHistory.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Fever%';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthMetrics WHERE metric_type='Blood Pressure' AND metric_value > 120;
SELECT Doctors.doctor_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Doctors INNER JOIN Treatments ON Doctors.doctor_id = Treatments.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.specialization='Cardiology';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Doctors.doctor_name, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients INNER JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors ON Treatments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id WHERE Doctors.specialization='Neurology';
